mapper.select: SELECT c.COURSE_NAME, c_p.COURSE_DEVISION, c.CREDIT, s_r.COURSE_REPORT FROM STUDENT_REPORT s_r JOIN COURSE c ON c.COURSE_CODE = s_r.COURSE_CODE JOIN COURSE_PROPERTY c_p ON c_p.COURSE_CODE = s_r.COURSE_CODE WHERE s_r.STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode}

SELECT COURSE_CODE FROM STUDENT_REPORT s_r WHERE s_r.STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode} AND (s_r.COURSE_REPORT = '2.5' OR s_r.COURSE_REPORT = '2.0' OR s_r.COURSE_REPORT ='1.5' OR s_r.COURSE_REPORT = '1.0' OR s_r.COURSE_REPORT = '0.0')
